description: Lists all feed endpoints published according to version sof the GBFS documentation. (added in v1.1) According to the Standard GBFS 2.2

last_updated.description: Property. Last time the data in the feed was updated in POSIX time.

ttl.description: Property. Number of seconds before the data in the feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed).

version.description: Property. GBFS version number to which the feed conforms, according to the versioning framework.

data.description: Property. Response data in the form of name:value pairs.

versions.description: Contains one object, as defined below, for each of the available versions of a feed. The array must be sorted by increasing MAJOR and MINOR version number.

version.description: The semantic version of the feed in the form X.Y

url.description: URL of the corresponding gbfs.json endpoint

type.descripton: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be gbfs_versions

title: Smart Data Models adaptation of GBFS standard data model gbfs_versions
